Brad Pitt cut a casual figure as he attended the Formula One US Grand Prix in Austin, Texas on Friday.

articles.title: Gareth Southgate has a decision to make with FOUR goalkeepers vying for the gloves at the World Cup - Daily Mail
articles.description: With Gareth Southgate's provisional squad already announced, we have at least been given some indication of what the team will look like at the World Cup, although it is still set to be drastically reduced.
